Detailed Description

Describes a single probe in a traceroute.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum TRItem::tri_status

traceroute item status

Enumerator:
replied  destination host replied, or TTL exceeded ICMP 11/0
timed_out  no reply whatsoever
host_unreach  not used - Host Unreachable ICMP 3/1
netw_unreach  not used - Network Unreachable ICMP 3/0
proto_unavail  not used - Protocol Unreachable ICMP 3/2
frag_needed  not used - Fragmentation Required ICMP 3/4

status is the probe status
ip_addr is the IPv4 address
